cont.entity_a: Worth its price, especially for high-end cameras.
cont.entity_b: Offers incredible value. Not a high-end lens but acceptable for the price.

cont.entity_a: Performs well in low light with Sony video cameras that allow lens changes.
cont.entity_b: Good everyday lens with fast autofocus. AF is a bit slow.

cont.entity_a: Produces phenomenal results with great optics. Amazing image quality with the 70-200 f2.8 lens and 2X converter, especially for wildlife photography. Fantastic lens for Sony Alpha a77M2, capable of tack-sharp images and great bokeh. Produces tack-sharp images, comparable to Zeiss lenses. Sharp wide open with effective eye autofocus.
cont.entity_b: At 28mm, images are a bit soft, but sharpness improves at 50mm-80mm. Soft at f/3.5 and f/18+, best used around f/11. Good for portraits, landscapes, and close-ups.

cont.entity_a: Compatible with Sony A7III and A-Mount LA-EA3 adapter.
Build and image quality justify the price tag. SSM is quiet and fast.
Excellent customer service with fast replacement.
Intermittently caused 2-4EV overexposure, but replacement worked perfectly.

cont.entity_b: Nice focal range of 28-80mm, suitable for various photography needs.
Not a professional lens, but suitable for amateur use. Good all-purpose lens for general use and a great bargain.
